conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric cutaway. All 3D conversion criteria met.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Perfect execution of dimensional transformation and orthographic isometric projection.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Layout is highly accurate. Minor note: the 2D plan shows two twin beds in the left room, while 3D shows one bed and a dresser. Wall topology is perfect.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement is nearly 1:1 with the floor plan, including the kitchen appliances, dining set, and office desk. One bed missing in left bedroom.

visual_clarity.notes: Extremely clean render with clear lighting and no UI contamination.

detected_errors.description: Left bedroom changed from twin beds to one bed and a chest of drawers.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and clean 3D isometric conversion that preserves almost every geometric detail of the original floor plan.
